msg: Subsequent variable declarations must have the same type.  Variable 'unionOfFunctionType' must be of type '(() => string) | (() => number)', but here has type '() => string | number'.
Subsequent variable declarations must have the same type.  Variable 'unionOfConstructorType' must be of type '(new () => string) | (new () => number)', but here has type 'new () => string | number'.
